channel.title: cli on jamie.so
channel.description: Recent content in cli on jamie.so

item.title: aws-vault
item.author: jbgmoore@gmail.com (jamie moore)
item.description: Need to use the awscli and don’t have time to implement federation? Can’t connect to existing identity systems due to the skunkworks nature of your project? Have many seperate clients and aws accounts to deal with? aws-vault is here to save you.

item.title: awscli and jq
item.author: jbgmoore@gmail.com (jamie moore)
item.description: Ah the classic partnerships, hot chocolate and marshmallows , hot dogs and sauce, hot aws cli and jq. Some days the GUI just won’t easily tell you what you want to know. The AWS CLI and jq to the rescue!
